summary: This bill, the Bringing Real Accountability Via Enforcement in Burma Act (BRAVE Burma Act), amends the Burma Unified through Rigorous Military Accountability Act of 2022. Key provisions include extending the sunset clause of the original act, mandating a presidential determination on sanctions against specific Burmese entities and individuals, and limiting potential increases to Burma's shareholding in the International Monetary Fund. It also mandates the appointment of a Special Envoy for Burma to coordinate U.S. policy, promote democracy, and oversee international efforts to pressure the Burmese military.
